content: introducing the ***circle leaf crochet pattern collection*** a curated bundle of video-supported size-inclusive garments xs 5x built around my circle leaf stitch 1 these patterns look complex but they re a breeze to follow even if you ve never made a garment before ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ special offer alert add any pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ the **circle leaf lace summer top** is a simple chic crochet piece that s perfect for effortless summer style worked in one seamless piece using the delicate and textured circle leaf stitch this top is light lacy and a dream to wear with its relaxed breezy fit and size-inclusive design it s ideal for layering over a vest or wearing on its own dress it up or keep it casual this versatile top is a go-to staple for warm days holiday outfits and everything in between the circle leaf crochet summer top is worked seamlessly in one piece from the top down it starts with neck ribbing joined in the round followed by a shaped yoke with increases stitches are then split for the flutter sleeves and body which is worked in the round an optional bottom ribbing adds a polished finish a video tutorial is included with this pattern 2 crochet hook e 3 5mm & g 4 0mm - or size to meet gauge 3 notions removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 tape measure 7 yarn colorful version malabrigo arroyo in colorway rosalina 8 100% superwash merino wool 335yds/100g white version comfy cotton sport 9 75% pima cotton 25% acrylic 136yds/50g yardage 670 745 820 895 969 1043 1118 1192 1229 yds this includes the yardage for the bottom ribbing if omitting the ribbing the yardage will be less 2 3 3 3 3 4 4 4 4 hanks of malabrigo 5 6 7 7 8 8 9 9 10 skeins for comfy sport yarn substitutions cascade 220 yarn 10 - 100% pure peruvian highland wool 220yds/100g abbreviations chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stdc - stacked double_crochet stsc - stacked single_crochet 11 st cluster - stacked cluster treble_crochet - treble_crochet yo - yarn over ws - wrong side gauge 8 sts and 8 row = 4 in circle leaf stitch unblocked not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 12 sizes xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x to fit chest size 32 36 40 44 48 52 56 60 64 skill level advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 13 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 14 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 15 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 16 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 17 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 18 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it
